text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria chalconeura is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is found in Cameroon and the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests.
text.References: Cheek, M. & Csiba, L. (2003). "Psychotria chalconeura". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2003: e.T43890A10829718. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2003.RLTS.T43890A10829718.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
